org.csstudio.platform.simpledal
Interface IProcessVariableConnectionService

All Known Implementing Classes:
ProcessVariableConnectionService
public interface IProcessVariableConnectionService

A service to connect to a process variable. You may use the ProcessVariableConnectionServiceFactory to create instances of this service.

Author:
C1 WPS / SW, MZ

getValueAsync

void getValueAsync(IProcessVariableAddress processVariableAddress,
                   ValueType valueType,
                   IProcessVariableValueListener<java.lang.Double> listener)
Gets a value via an asynchronous call. When the value is read, the listener will receive a callback on it IProcessVariableValueListener.valueChanged(Object) method.

Parameters:
processVariableAddress - the process variable
valueType - the expected value type
listener - the callback listener

register

void register(IProcessVariableValueListener listener,
              IProcessVariableAddress pv,
              ValueType valueType)
Registers a listener for the specified process variable.

Parameters:
listener - the listener to be informed about value changes
pv - the process variable address
valueType - the expected value type
